reviewtext: Just got these today and yes as any other grown "KID" I took these out and tested them sitting on my front deck. Bushnell is a well trusted name and I am glad that I went with this pair of Binoculars. If you are looking for a great pair of binoculars at a GREAT price these are for you. Excellent clarity and I absolutely love the "insta focus" these have. I hike the Adirondacks in NY and can't wait to take these out when I am on the summit of a mountain.
